item.title: Leveraging an ECG Beat Diffusion Model for Morphological Reconstruction from Indirect Signals
item.description: BeatDiff, a lightweight diffusion model, reconstructs ECG morphology from indirect signals, enabling noise removal, artifact reduction, missing-lead recovery, and anomaly detection.

item.title: Near-Optimal Distributionally Robust Reinforcement Learning with General $L_p$ Norms
item.description: This paper presents near-optimal sample complexity bounds for solving distributionally robust reinforcement learning problems with general Lp norms, showing robust RL can be more sample-efficient than…
